name: Conjuring Enchiridion
landing_text: Welcome to Conjuring!$(br)To begin, check out $(l:conjuring:basics/getting_started)Getting Started$().$(p)Should you have problems or discover a bug, feel free to join my $(l:https://discord.com/invite/xrwHKktV2d)Discord$() or report them on $(l:https://github.com/glisco03/conjuring/issues)GitHub$().
